title: Victory at Ai
summary: Joshua 8 recounts Israel’s victory over Ai after dealing with Achan’s sin. This time, God gives them a strategy to ambush the city. After the battle, Joshua renews the covenant by reading the law on Mount Ebal.

faq.question: How did Israel defeat Ai the second time?
faq.answer: They used an ambush strategy commanded by God and overtook the city.

faq.question: What did Joshua do after the battle?
faq.answer: He built an altar and read the entire law to all the people.
